hero.animatedText: A passionate team devoted to unlocking every learner's potential with intelligent, AI-driven assessment solutions.
hero.subtext: We're building the all-in-one adaptive learning and evaluation platform for modern education.

teamSection.heading: Meet Our Team
teamSection.description1: We are a diverse group of educators, engineers, and innovators united by a common goal: to transform learning through cutting-edge technology.
teamSection.description2: Our team combines decades of experience in education, artificial intelligence, and software development to create solutions that truly make a difference in how people learn and grow.
teamSection.valuesSubheading: The principles that guide our mission to transform education through innovative technology
